pr_title: DynamicLinks documentation updates and simple code changes

timeline.message: Documentation updates and simple code changes.

timeline.bodyText: that is a drastic change from iPad to Android, pls make sure it's intended
timeline.author: vkryachko

replies.bodyText: Yeah, it's quite a change. If you see the code, the getParcelable is reading KEY_ANDROID_FALLBACK_LINK :-)
replies.author: rlazo
